r.d: The Config package provides methods for configuration manipulation. * Creates configurations from scratch * Parses and outputs different formats (XML, PHP, INI, Apache...). * Edits existing configurations * Converts configurations to other formats * Allows manipulation of sections, comments, directives... * Parses configurations into a tree structure
r.n: * Added new method registerConfigType() (Greg Beaver) * Root containers are not named 'root' anymore (Bertrand Mansion) * IniCommented handles comma, quotes, slashes (Greg Beaver) * IniFile and IniCommented take care of slashes (Greg Beaver) * Method _parseArray() in PHPArray refactored and much faster (Bertrand Mansion) * Fix bugs with certain type of arrays with PHPArray (Bertrand Mansion) * PHPArray now returns values between single quotes (Jean-Marc Fontaine)
